# Mississippi Reports

<br>

<center> Passwords for Reports are [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eAUdWEzc0R7WzpztOvutRp2FYDtpks37LSFV8sq8ezg/edit?usp=sharing) which will only be viewable if you are a Teaching Lab employee. </center>

<br>

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c("Mid-Year Reports 2021-2022",
               "Mississippi Teacher-Level Reports",
               "End of Year Reports 2020-2021"),
  long_name = location,
  image_url = c(here::here("Images/Reports/Midyear/2021-2022-tl-report_All Partners.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/Mississippi_reports.png"),
                here::here("Images/Reports/Reports.png")),
  link = c("mid_year_reports_21_22.html",
           "mississippi_reports_21_22.html",
           "end_of_year_20_21.html")
)

report_galleries %>%
  cards(
    title = "Reports",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "inset-bottom",
    spacing = 3
  )
```
